string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Which of the following is not a programming language?,Java,PHP,Python,HTML,HTML
Which of the following is not a RDBMS?,MySQL,Oracle,Postgres,MongoDB,MongoDB
Which of the following is not an OS?,Windows,Linux,Casendra,Ubuntu,Casendra
Which of the following language is supported in Android Studio?,Kotlin,PHP,Python,VB,Kotlin
Which of the following is not a country?,Nepal,India,China,Paris,Paris
